class_notes: Must seek permission from faculty to enroll.
course_description: Honors Seminar is the first of four required courses focused on topics relevant to the development and completion of the honors thesis.  Students will identify an area of interest and faculty mentor, and design their project purpose and develop a plan and timeline for completion.
